description: Gay rights pioneer Arnie Kantrowitz shelved dreams of publishing his novel. Three years after his death, his partner fulfils his wish.
title: Walt Whitman, gay love and a posthumous novel

description: Author Travis Jonker and illustrator Matthew Cordell talk about the real model ship that inspired their picture book about a man, his son, a mouse, and the voyage that brings them together.
title: A little mouse sets sail on a big adventure in 'The Ship in the Window'

description: Harris wants to make it easier for eligible voters to cast ballots and rebuild Voting Rights Act protections against racial discrimination, while Trump pushes for more restrictions to voting access.
title: The stark divide between Harris and Trump on voting rights

description: Many residents impacted by inland flooding near Tampa can't return home as floodwaters slowly recede. One church in Valrico is providing food and other resources to residents in the neighborhood.
title: 'There is no home:' Floridians find helping hands after floods

description: Since the remnants of Hurricane Helene hit Asheville, most of the city has been without running water. The people of Asheville have devised elaborate systems to stay clean and flush their toilets.
title: With no running water, Asheville finds other ways to flush thousands of toilets
